Class LoopSubplan

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:

public class LoopSubplan extends Subplan
Wraps a loop of Operators.

  • Method Details

    • wrap

      public static LoopSubplan wrap(LoopHeadOperator loopHead, List<InputSlot<?>> inputs, List<OutputSlot<?>> outputs)
      Creates a new instance with the given operators. Initializes the InputSlots and OutputSlots, steals existing connections, initializes the Subplan.slotMapping, and sets as inner Operators' parent.
